Initial Next.js 14 project setup with authentication and database

Features implemented:
- Next.js 14.2 with App Router and TypeScript

- Complete project structure (app/, lib/, components/, prisma/)
- Environment configuration (.env.example)
- Database models: User, DailyInformation, DutyRoster, BonfireNotification, AuditLog
- Whitelist-based access control
- Role-based authorization (OPERATOR, ADMINISTRATOR)
- Priority system for messages (CRITICAL, NORMAL)

Updated documentation:
- README.md with complete setup instructions
- proposal.md with cloud deployment strategy
- Brainstorming session results documented

Ready for Week 1 development:
- Folder/tab navigation structure
- Basic UI components
- Google Maps integration preparation
